messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] London Shinsa
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks and cheers. Looks like the typhoon is moving off. Gordon ...
messages.messageBody:
Thanks and cheers. Looks like the typhoon is moving off.

Gordon

> Have a safe trip mate
>
> Rich

messages.msgSnippet: Have a safe trip mate Rich ... From: Gordon Robson To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com Sent: Sunday, September 21, 2003 8:13 PM Subject: Re: [nihontostudy] London

Have a safe trip mate

Rich
----- Original Message -----
From: Gordon Robson
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, September 21, 2003 8:13 PM
Subject: Re: [nihontostudy] London Shinsa


Hi all,

Well, if the typhoon doesn't stop me, Herr Spinn Meister and his evil
minions certainly won't. I'm off to London. See you all in a week, or
better yet, this weekend.

Gordon

Hi all,

Well, if the typhoon doesn't stop me, Herr Spinn Meister and his evil
minions certainly won't. I'm off to London. See you all in a week, or
better yet, this weekend.

Gordon

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Sukashi Tsuba book
messages.msgSnippet: I have the Japanese one, but not the English one, but me impression is that they are the same. Off to Jolly Old England tomorrow. Cheers dude!! Gordon ...
messages.messageBody:
I have the Japanese one, but not the English one, but me impression is
that they are the same. Off to Jolly Old England tomorrow. Cheers dude!!

Gordon

Rich

condition.

Gordon

messages.subject: Sukashi Tsuba book
messages.msgSnippet: http://cgi.ebay.com.au/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=3553265492&ssPageName=ADME:B:SS:AU:1 Hi all, is this the same as the English version of Sasano s Sukashi
messages.messageBody:
http://cgi.ebay.com.au/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=3553265492&ssPageName=ADME:B:SS:AU:1

Hi all, is this the same as the English version of Sasano's Sukashi book ?. The layout looks different but appears to have the same information.

Rich
